attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, with interest rates being so low, there is little chance of winning on the premium bonds.  Therefore, until interest rates rise above 5% again, each prize value should be divided by 10, and have 10 times as many winners, i.e instead of having 2 £1,000,000 winners each month, there should be 20 £100,000 winners.
